Class NodePrimitiveQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiNodeTermQuery, NodeConstantScoreQuery, NodePhraseQuery, NodeTermQuery

    public abstract class NodePrimitiveQuery
extends NodeQuery
    Abstraction over all the primitive NodeQuerys such as NodeTermQuery.
